006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark; // NOPMD AST processor
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.Formatter;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.MarkdownWriter;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.NodeFormatter;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.NodeFormatterContext;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.NodeFormatterFactory;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.NodeFormattingHandler;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlWriter;
016import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderer;
017import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererContext;
018import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererFactory;
019import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderingHandler;
020import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.FlexmarkHtmlConverter;
021import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlMarkdownWriter;
022import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeConverterContext;
023import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRenderer;
024import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRendererFactory;
025import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRendererHandler;
026import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.InlineParser;
027import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.InlineParserExtension;
028import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.InlineParserExtensionFactory;
029import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.LightInlineParser;
030import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
031import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
032import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.NodeVisitorBase;
033import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataHolder;
034import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataKey;
035import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.MutableDataHolder;
036import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.sequence.BasedSequence;
037import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.sequence.CharSubSequence;
038
039import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.IMarkupString;
040
041import org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
042
043import java.util.Collections;
044import java.util.LinkedList;
045import java.util.List;
046import java.util.Set;
047import java.util.function.Predicate;
048import java.util.regex.Matcher;
049import java.util.regex.Pattern;
050
051import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
052
053public class InsertAnchorExtension
054    implements Parser.ParserExtension, HtmlRenderer.HtmlRendererExtension,
055    Formatter.FormatterExtension, FlexmarkHtmlConverter.HtmlConverterExtension {
056  public static final DataKey<Boolean> ENABLE_INLINE_INSERT_ANCHORS
057      = new DataKey<>("ENABLE_INLINE_INSERT_ANCHORS", true);
058  public static final DataKey<Boolean> ENABLE_RENDERING = new DataKey<>("ENABLE_RENDERING", true);
059
060  /**
061   * Construct a new extension instance.
062   *
063   * @return the instance
064   */
065  public static InsertAnchorExtension newInstance() {
066    return new InsertAnchorExtension();
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  public void parserOptions(MutableDataHolder options) {
071    // do nothing
072  }
073
074  @Override
075  public void rendererOptions(MutableDataHolder options) {
076    // do nothing
077  }
078
079  @Override
080  public void extend(HtmlRenderer.Builder rendererBuilder, String rendererType) {
081    rendererBuilder.nodeRendererFactory(new InsertAnchorNodeRenderer.Factory());
082  }
083
084  @Override
085  public void extend(Parser.Builder parserBuilder) {
086    if (ENABLE_INLINE_INSERT_ANCHORS.get(parserBuilder)) {
087      parserBuilder.customInlineParserExtensionFactory(new InsertAnchorInlineParser.Factory());
088    }
089  }
090
091  @Override
092  public void extend(Formatter.Builder builder) {
093    builder.nodeFormatterFactory(new InsertAnchorFormatter.Factory());
094  }
095
096  @Override
097  public void extend(FlexmarkHtmlConverter.Builder builder) {
098    builder.htmlNodeRendererFactory(new InsertAnchorHtmlNodeRenderer.Factory());
099  }
100
101  private static class InsertAnchorOptions {
102    public final boolean enableInlineInsertAnchors;
103    public final boolean enableRendering;
104
105    public InsertAnchorOptions(DataHolder options) {
106      enableInlineInsertAnchors = ENABLE_INLINE_INSERT_ANCHORS.get(options);
107      enableRendering = ENABLE_RENDERING.get(options);
108    }
109  }
110
111  private static class InsertAnchorNodeRenderer implements NodeRenderer {
112    private final InsertAnchorOptions options;
113
114    public InsertAnchorNodeRenderer(DataHolder options) {
115      this.options = new InsertAnchorOptions(options);
116    }
117
118    @Override
119    public Set<NodeRenderingHandler<?>> getNodeRenderingHandlers() {
120      return Collections.singleton(new NodeRenderingHandler<>(InsertAnchorNode.class, this::render));
121    }
122
123    @SuppressWarnings("unused")
124    protected void render(InsertAnchorNode node, NodeRendererContext context, HtmlWriter html) {
125      if (options.enableRendering) {
126        html.attr("type", node.getType()).attr("id-ref", node.getIdReference()).withAttr().tagVoid("insert");
127      }
128    }
129
130    public static class Factory implements NodeRendererFactory {
131
132      @Override
133      public NodeRenderer apply(DataHolder options) {
134        return new InsertAnchorNodeRenderer(options);
135      }
136    }
137  }
138
139  private static class InsertAnchorInlineParser implements InlineParserExtension {
140    private static final Pattern PATTERN = Pattern.compile("\\{\\{\\s*insert:\\s*([^\\s]+),\\s*([^\\s]+)\\s*\\}\\}");
141
142    public InsertAnchorInlineParser(@SuppressWarnings("unused") LightInlineParser inlineParser) {
143      // do nothing
144    }
145
146    @Override
147    public void finalizeDocument(InlineParser inlineParser) {
148      // do nothing
149    }
150
151    @Override
152    public void finalizeBlock(InlineParser inlineParser) {
153      // do nothing
154    }
155
156    @Override
157    public boolean parse(LightInlineParser inlineParser) {
158      if (inlineParser.peek() == '{') {
159        BasedSequence input = inlineParser.getInput();
160        Matcher matcher = inlineParser.matcher(PATTERN);
161        if (matcher != null) {
162          BasedSequence type = input.subSequence(matcher.start(1), matcher.end(1));
163          BasedSequence idReference = input.subSequence(matcher.start(2), matcher.end(2));
164          assert type != null;
165          assert idReference != null;
166          inlineParser.appendNode(new InsertAnchorNode(type, idReference));
167          return true; // NOPMD - readability
168        }
169      }
170      return false;
171    }
172
173    public static class Factory implements InlineParserExtensionFactory {
174      @Override
175      public Set<Class<?>> getAfterDependents() {
176        return Collections.emptySet();
177      }
178
179      @Override
180      public CharSequence getCharacters() {
181        return "{";
182      }
183
184      @Override
185      public Set<Class<?>> getBeforeDependents() {
186        return Collections.emptySet();
187      }
188
189      @Override
190      public InlineParserExtension apply(LightInlineParser lightInlineParser) {
191        return new InsertAnchorInlineParser(lightInlineParser);
192      }
193
194      @Override
195      public boolean affectsGlobalScope() {
196        return false;
197      }
198    }
199  }
200
201  private static class InsertAnchorFormatter implements NodeFormatter {
202    private final InsertAnchorOptions options;
203
204    public InsertAnchorFormatter(DataHolder options) {
205      this.options = new InsertAnchorOptions(options);
206    }
207
208    @Override
209    public Set<NodeFormattingHandler<?>> getNodeFormattingHandlers() {
210      return options.enableInlineInsertAnchors
211          ? Collections.singleton(new NodeFormattingHandler<>(InsertAnchorNode.class, this::render))
212          : Collections.emptySet();
213    }
214
215    @SuppressWarnings("unused")
216    protected void render(InsertAnchorNode node, NodeFormatterContext context, MarkdownWriter markdown) {
217      if (options.enableRendering) {
218        markdown.append("{{ insert: ");
219        markdown.append(node.getType());
220        markdown.append(", ");
221        markdown.append(node.getIdReference());
222        markdown.append(" }}");
223      }
224    }
225
226    @Override
227    public Set<Class<?>> getNodeClasses() {
228      return Collections.singleton(InsertAnchorNode.class);
229    }
230
231    public static class Factory implements NodeFormatterFactory {
232
233      @Override
234      public NodeFormatter create(DataHolder options) {
235        return new InsertAnchorFormatter(options);
236      }
237
238    }
239  }
240
241  private static class InsertAnchorHtmlNodeRenderer implements HtmlNodeRenderer {
242    private final InsertAnchorOptions options;
243
244    public InsertAnchorHtmlNodeRenderer(DataHolder options) {
245      this.options = new InsertAnchorOptions(options);
246    }
247
248    @Override
249    public Set<HtmlNodeRendererHandler<?>> getHtmlNodeRendererHandlers() {
250      return options.enableInlineInsertAnchors
251          ? Collections.singleton(new HtmlNodeRendererHandler<>("insert", Element.class, this::processInsert))
252          : Collections.emptySet();
253    }
254
255    private void processInsert( // NOPMD used as lambda
256        Element node,
257        @SuppressWarnings("unused") HtmlNodeConverterContext context,
258        HtmlMarkdownWriter out) {
259
260      String type = node.attr("type");
261      String idRef = node.attr("id-ref");
262
263      out.append("{{ insert: ");
264      out.append(type);
265      out.append(", ");
266      out.append(idRef);
267      out.append(" }}");
268    }
269
270    public static class Factory implements HtmlNodeRendererFactory {
271
272      @Override
273      public HtmlNodeRenderer apply(DataHolder options) {
274        return new InsertAnchorHtmlNodeRenderer(options);
275      }
276    }
277  }
278
279  public static class InsertAnchorNode
280      extends Node {
281
282    @NonNull
283    private final BasedSequence type;
284    @NonNull
285    private BasedSequence idReference;
286
287    /**
288     * Construct a new Metaschema insert node.
289     *
290     * @param type
291     *          the type of insertion
292     * @param idReference
293     *          the identifier of the given type to use to determine what to insert
294     */
295    @SuppressWarnings("null")
296    public InsertAnchorNode(@NonNull String type, @NonNull String idReference) {
297      this(CharSubSequence.of(type), CharSubSequence.of(idReference));
298    }
299
300    /**
301     * Construct a new Metaschema insert node.
302     *
303     * @param type
304     *          the type of insertion
305     * @param idReference
306     *          the identifier of the given type to use to determine what to insert
307     */
308    protected InsertAnchorNode(@NonNull BasedSequence type, @NonNull BasedSequence idReference) {
309      this.type = type;
310      this.idReference = idReference;
311    }
312
313    /**
314     * Get the type of insertion.
315     *
316     * @return the type of insertion
317     */
318    @NonNull
319    public BasedSequence getType() {
320      return type;
321    }
322
323    /**
324     * Get the identifier of the given type to use to determine what to insert.
325     *
326     * @return the identifier
327     */
328    @NonNull
329    public BasedSequence getIdReference() {
330      return idReference;
331    }
332
333    /**
334     * Set the identifier of the given type to use to determine what to insert.
335     *
336     * @param idReference
337     *          the identifier
338     */
339    public void setIdReference(@NonNull BasedSequence idReference) {
340      this.idReference = idReference;
341    }
342
343    @Override
344    @NonNull
345    public BasedSequence[] getSegments() {
346      @NonNull
347      BasedSequence[] retval = { getType(), getIdReference() };
348      return retval;
349    }
350
351    @Override
352    public void getAstExtra(StringBuilder out) {
353      segmentSpanChars(out, getType(), "type");
354      segmentSpanChars(out, getIdReference(), "id-ref");
355    }
356  }
357
358  /**
359   * Used to collect insert nodes.
360   */
361  public static class InsertVisitor
362      extends NodeVisitorBase {
363    @NonNull
364    private final List<InsertAnchorNode> inserts = new LinkedList<>();
365    @NonNull
366    private final Predicate<InsertAnchorNode> filter;
367
368    /**
369     * Construct a new visitor that will use the provided filter to visit matching
370     * insert nodes.
371     *
372     * @param filter
373     *          the match criteria to use to identify matching insert nodes
374     */
375    public InsertVisitor(@NonNull Predicate<InsertAnchorNode> filter) {
376      this.filter = filter;
377    }
378
379    /**
380     * Process markup to identify insert nodes.
381     *
382     * @param markup
383     *          the markup to process
384     * @return this visitor
385     */
386    public InsertVisitor processNode(@NonNull IMarkupString<?> markup) {
387      visit(markup.getDocument());
388      return this;
389    }
390
391    @Override
392    protected void visit(Node node) {
393      if (node instanceof InsertAnchorNode) {
394        InsertAnchorNode insert = (InsertAnchorNode) node;
395        if (filter.test(insert)) {
396          inserts.add((InsertAnchorNode) node);
397        }
398      } else {
399        visitChildren(node);
400      }
401    }
402
403    /**
404     * Get the collected insert nodes.
405     *
406     * @return the nodes
407     */
408    @NonNull
409    public List<InsertAnchorNode> getInserts() {
410      return inserts;
411    }
412  }
413}
